attributes.review: I got this app as a loyal trump supporter but after installing it the kids in my basement started chanting “ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆” at first i thought nothing of it so i opened the app and there was peaches and trump yuhhh gettin to itttt 👁👄👁 peaches cut off his cheeto and ate it 😔 i simply just deleted the app and just installed it again but  i heard a faint “ŸËÄH ŸĘÄH” in the distance i stared to throw it back uncontrollably to the quran while i jiglly tiddly
attributes.title: debby ryan

attributes.review: I opened that app and was absolutely flabbergasted 😮.There was an obnoxious photo of what seemed to be a Cheeto puff which confused me because I left my chips in the kitchen. Then after that I never looked at Cheeto puffs the same again and threw up at what i guess is the president 🤢. But to finish it off I will leave you with some advice don’t download the app! And if you do be prepared to buy bleach for your eyes and be scarred for life
attributes.title: No ❤️🤢!

attributes.review: I am disgusted. This app is a waste of time. First, I see an orange man doing weird fornite dancing 🤮 and then watched a short video of someone being a racist and having a rapping battle with anti-racists. 🤪🤪🤪 As I was trying to fill in the survey all I found were dead memes and minion Facebook posts, which were not funny at all. Lastly, I saw a Dorito jumping up and down saying “Hola niños” and then started to scream. I was terrified. 😳😳😢😭😨😰😤🤫😖😑😑😟🤔😥😭🥶😭😰😭😢😭🥶🥶😭😥😭😰😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😱😰😤😓😢😓🤭😖😐😖😫🤭
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: I only gave one star to write this review. Just horrible, the most horrific app I’ve used. And I’ve used many apps before. Many. I think the person running this has no idea what they’re doing, i blame it all on them. All of it. It’s fake news. This app should be met with fire and fury like the world has never seen. We have no choice but to totally destroy this app.
attributes.title: Horrible just horrible

attributes.review: When I first opened the app I decided to see if it was tracking us in anyway, what I discovered was it gets our location, pictures, apps we own, age, any relatives, social media’s, IP address, and if they wanted to they could get our passwords for all are information, I truly don’t know what the government is trying to do but what ever it is it’s not good
attributes.title: Takes our Information

attributes.review: Tik tok is not just a place for social media content but it’s also a place for Jesus Content and something that can make us laugh and smile when were sad and to make our own content so before you make that decision actually give a dam about people and the things your shutting down because very so a lot of things are gonna back fire I said it once and I’ll say it again 😌👏🏼
attributes.title: DONT BAND TIK TOK

attributes.review: I went to download this app as soon as I opened it my phone started glitching extremely bad and it got to the point where I couldn’t use it anymore I had to go and buy a entire new phone because my phone wouldn’t work anymore I’m so upset I had plans to make a trip with my family and I can’t do it cause I spent all my money on a new phone
attributes.title: Never again😡😡

attributes.review: trump has the AUDACITY to call himself a good president after he has done the worst job at keeping people safe from the COVID-19 virus while having the biggest economy in the world🤦🏻‍♂️ Imagine having all this money and still being the worst country, it’s almost like we’re a throw world country it’s sad that he’s president he’s an embarrassment to America and an absolute joke. Trump 2020 but on a ✨gravestone✨(for legal reasons I was joking)
attributes.title: Worst president ever 🤢🤮

attributes.review: this app is spreading misinformation. the first thing I saw when I went on the app was “keep America great”. this statement implies that America is currently great, and unfortunately, it is not. whether it be systemic racism, homophobia or anything else, this country clearly has problems and the Cheeto in charge isn’t helping. if he was a flaming hot Cheeto, it might be going better, but he’s just a soggy normal Cheeto that gets stuck in your teeth.
attributes.title: utter disappointment

attributes.review: i opened this app and all i saw was a cheeto trying to persuade me to vote for him or something??? he then threatened to raid my house and steal everything from my fridge, including my dog and my brother! i was absolutely horrified and in complete shock. my bed then started to LEVITATE and that’s when i just lost it. i can not BELIEVE they put apps like this on the internet. what a shame. it’s crazy what this world has come to😪
attributes.title: HORRIBLE smelly and disgusting❤️
